tool_description: Synchronizes inventory updates across multiple warehouse locations and sales channels, ensuring data consistency and managing distribution center allocations.

source_location.description: Source warehouse location code where change originated

target_locations.description: List of target locations to synchronize with

sync_type.description: Type of synchronization: full_sync, partial_sync, or rebalance

distribution_rule.description: Distribution rule: equal, weighted, or priority_based

channel_sync_enabled.description: Whether to sync with online sales channels

max_sync_delay.description: Maximum acceptable sync delay in minutes

error_messages: Invalid sync type: Use one of [full_sync, partial_sync, rebalance].
Invalid distribution rule: Use one of [equal, weighted, priority_based].
Location not reachable: One or more target locations are not responding.
Sync timeout exceeded: Synchronization took longer than max_sync_delay.
Channel integration error: Failed to sync with one or more sales channels.
usage: Provide primary_sku, source_location, target_locations, and sync parameters. The tool will coordinate inventory synchronization across all specified locations.

sync_status.description: Overall synchronization status: completed, partial, or failed

locations_failed.description: List of locations that failed synchronization

total_inventory.description: Total inventory across all synchronized locations

sync_duration.description: Time taken for synchronization in seconds
